description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Hanoi, Vietnam. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Glamorous Hanoi French-Inspired Luxury with Four Restaurants & Bars, Day Spa & Pool
hotels.description: A wondrous symphony of roaring twenties charm, architectural excellence and traditional Vietnamese touches awaits you at Capella Hanoi. The five-star old-world-inspired beauty is award-winning in its appeal, claiming Travel + Leisure’s Runner-Up for the Best City Hotel in Asia in 2022, and romantic in its execution, with incredible attention to detail and reverence for creativity on every level. Designed by renowned architect, Bill Bensley, each magnificent guest room elegantly draws inspiration from history’s best operatic performers. Sample a melody of epicurean creations throughout the hotel’s magnificent dining offering. Start with single-origin coffee and delectable breakfast at Backstage, elevate your afternoon with upscale oysters and top-shelf whiskeys at The Hudson Rooms, and indulge in an immersive Japanese-inspired cultural experience at Koki that goes beyond incredible dishes. Slip into something nice and wander down to Diva’s Lounge in the evening for a tempting tipple with menus reminiscent of 1920s New York. Nourish your spirit with a swim in the grand outdoor pool, schvitz in the sauna or steam bath, or with a holistic day spa treatment. Forget the future - at Capella Hanoi, the real beauty lies in the sophistication of the past.

hotels.title: Five-Star Vietnam Escape in the Heart of Hanoi
hotels.description: Discover Hanoi’s storied history, enviable food scene, and show-stopping vistas from your base at this luxurious Pan Pacific hotel, offering panoramic views of West Lake and the city skyline. When you aren't exploring the lantern-lit alleys of the Old Quarter, just 10 minutes away, unwind with signature treatments at the spa, head to the 20th floor to sip delectable cocktails at the Summit Bar, dine across four elegant bars and restaurants, or rejuvenate at the hotel’s glass-domed indoor pool. Relish in five-star luxury and unparalleled comforts at Pan Pacific Hanoi, a tranquil paradise in the heart of Vietnam's vibrant capital city, Hanoi. After exciting days spent exploring ancient attractions and contemporary dining, rejuvenate at the hotel’s shimmering pool, fully equipped fitness centre and relaxing spa. Then, head to the 20th floor to sip delectable cocktails at the Summit Bar and soak up sprawling views of glittering West Lake.

hotels.title: Novotel Hanoi City Retreat with Two Restaurants, Outdoor Pool & Rooftop Bar
hotels.description: Discover the vibrant heart of Vietnam's capital with a stay in Hanoi, known for its centuries-old architecture, rich history and thriving food scene. This modern oasis, located in the dynamic district of Cau Giay, offers easy access to the city's famous Old Quarter and the serene Hoan Kiem Lake. Savour a fusion of traditional Vietnamese and international cuisine at the alfresco Craft B&R, or drink in refreshing views of the city from the Rooftop Bar . Keep up with your fitness routine at the state-of-the-art gym, or take a dip in the inviting pool in between discovering the very best of this dynamic city.

hotels.title: Contemporary Chic Hanoi City Stay near Old Quarter with Two Restaurants & Rooftop Infinity Pool & Bar
hotels.description: Vietnam's capital is bursting with incredible colonial architecture, flavoursome cuisines and peaceful city parks, and this hotel places you perfectly in the city's bustling centre, set to experience it all. Five-star sophistication awaits your return each night, with authentic Vietnamese cuisine at the hotel's elegant restaurant, a tranquil spa and a trendy rooftop infinity pool and bar. The hotel is a stone's throw from the Old Quarter, renowned for its colonial architecture and colourful markets. For a cultural treat, visit the Temple of Literature, or consider taking a day trip to UNESCO-listed Ha Long Bay.

hotels.title: Vibrant Central Hanoi Mövenpick Escape with Miami-Inspired Pool Club & Iconic Chocolate Hour
hotels.description: Discover the secrets of Vietnam's beating heart, Hanoi, with a stay at this modern hotel with French-style architecture perfectly paired with Vietnamese touches. This elegant hotel is perfectly positioned for exploring the city's bustling Old Quarter, home to the renowned Dong Xuan Market and the historic Hoan Kiem Lake. After a day of sightseeing, retreat to the hotel's wellness centre, complete with a state-of-the-art fitness suite and sauna. Savour delectable Vietnamese cuisine at the onsite Mangosteen Restaurant, or sip on expertly crafted cocktails at the stylish Lounge 83. Experience Miami vibes and Latin tunes on at the fourth-floor with a dip in the cabana pool while the sun smiles down on you.

hotels.title: Five-Star Sky-High Hanoi City Escape within City's Highest Skyscraper
hotels.description: Discover new heights of luxury at the five-star InterContinental Hanoi Landmark72, an IHG Hotel, positioned within the city’s tallest luxury skyscraper, in the heart of Hanoi's vibrant new business district. Experience true opulence above the clouds - take high tea at The Hive Lounge, savour lavish open kitchen breakfasts at 3 Spoons, taste world-class wagyu at Stellar Teppanyaki or savour time spent by the hotel's oasis-like outdoor pool, surrounded by spectacular views of the city below.

hotels.title: Central Hanoi Escape near Old Quarter with Onsite Tennis Court
hotels.description: Experience historical Hanoi while staying in pure comfort at this charming abode - the perfect home base close to the bustling streets of the Old Quarter. Mere steps from the Hanoi Railway Station, you're in prime position to explore sights like the serene Hoan Kiem Lake and the storied Temple of Literature. After wandering Hanoi's lively streets, savour a meal at the onsite restaurant, Brasserie La Pavillion, or opt for the convenience of in-room dining. Stay energised with a workout in the fitness centre, practise your serve at the tennis courts or simply unwind in your contemporary room.

hotels.title: Cosmopolitan Vietnam Escape with Hanoi's Only Overwater Sunset Bar
hotels.description: Take in Vietnam sophistication at the modern InterContinental Hanoi Westlake, an IHG Hotel, positioned lakeside in the vibrant district of Tay Ho. Indulge in the hotel's world-class international dining options, before heading out to discover historic temples, beautiful cathedrals, and the city's greatest local attractions on your doorstep. After a long day of exploring, head back to catch a spectacular sunset spectacle on the West Lake, at Hanoi's only overwater bar, Sunset Bar.

hotels.title: French-Inspired Elegance in the Heart of Hanoi with Outdoor Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Relish the timeless grandeur of Hanoi with this Sofitel stay, where elegance meets old-world charm in the heart of the vibrant Old Quarter. Indulge at one of the various bars and eateries, including Le Beaulieu Restaurant, renowned for exceptional French cuisine. Sip on a cocktail at Bamboo Bar or unwind by the outdoor pool, surrounded by lush greenery. Enjoy your convenient location just steps away from the Hanoi Opera House and the picturesque Hoan Kiem Lake. Immerse yourself in the magic of the city as you explore bustling markets, historic landmarks and vibrant nightlife, before heading back to the hotel for indulgent treatments at the lavish onsite spa.

hotels.vendor_name: Hotel de l'Opera Hanoi, MGallery by Sofitel
hotels.title: Sophisticated Hanoi Escape with Stunning Opera House Views, Onsite Dining & Pool
hotels.description: Nestled in the heart of Hanoi, this property invites you into world of elegance, culture and luxury. Moments from the iconic Hanoi Opera House and Hoan Kiem Lake, this hotel seamlessly blends French colonial charm with contemporary sophistication. Meticulously designed rooms and suites offer unparalleled comfort and the onsite restaurants take you on a culinary journey like no other. Step into the breathtaking eight-story indoor atrium, an architectural marvel crowned with a glass ceiling, or indulge in five-star service and world-class amenities. When you're not exploring the city's bustling markets and historic landmarks, take a moment to relax in the hotel's luxurious spa or enjoy a refreshing dip in the indoor pool. Whether you’re venturing out to discover rich history or savouring a night at the opera, this destination promises a truly remarkable travel experience.

hotels.title: Elevated Hanoi Five-Star City Retreat with Onsite Restaurant, Rooftop Bar & Terrace Pool
hotels.description: Discover the vibrant heart of Vietnam's capital with a stay in Hanoi, know for its centuries-old architecture, rich history and thriving food scene. Perfectly positioned to enjoy sprawling views across the city, this modern hotel offers easy access to a myriad of local attractions, including the Temple of Literature and enchanting Hoan Kiem Lake. After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's serene pool on the sixth floor terrace, or indulge in a sundowner with a view from the Rooftop Bar, located on the 27th floor. For a taste of local culture, venture to the nearby Old Quarter, renowned for its bustling markets and street food stalls arranged along the colourful, narrow streets.

hotels.title: Cosmopolitan Hanoi City Break with Outdoor Pool & Luxe Spa
hotels.description: Feel the pulse of Hanoi from this Pullman city oasis, perfectly positioned in the heart of Vietnam's vibrant capital. Embrace the hotel's cosmopolitan aura, featuring stylish interiors, well-appointed rooms and an array of top-notch facilities to elevate your escape. Plus, when you wish to explore, cultural gems like the charming Old Quarter and Hoan Kiem Lake are a stone's throw away. In between sightseeing, take a refreshing dip in the sparkling outdoor pool or pamper yourself with massages at the spa. Later, savour authentic Vietnamese delicacies at La Cheminée restaurant, and sip on expertly crafted cocktails at the upscale Mint Bar.
